alert.note: Alert for Appling; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 2:20AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL COFFEE... NORTHWESTERN BACON...JEFF DAVIS AND NORTHWESTERN APPLING COUNTIES THROUGH 245 AM EDT... At 220 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of West Green, or 12 miles northwest of Alma, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph, half inch hail, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Baxley, Hazlehurst, Alma, Graham, West Green, Denton, and Pine Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
